content: starfish amigurumi crochet pattern by cinciut starfish thank you for buying my pattern i have tried to make this pattern as accurate and complete as possible to help you complete in the best way this project text and illustrations have been thoroughly checked but no warranty is given and results are not guaranteed the author assumes no responsibility for any unsatisfactory results from the materials contained in the present pattern for any help in understanding the pattern please do not hesitate to contact me cinciut@gmail com i d love to see your finished creations if you like you can share on raverly http //www ravelry com or on facebook http //www facebook com/pages/cinciut/423681371000267 copyrights you are not allowed to sell copy modify translate in any language any part or the whole tutorial and/or selling it or claim it as yours the same for all the pictures on the contrary you can sell the finished products unless they are from copyrighted characters created thorough the pattern provided that you give me credits and you don t produce large numbers of finished products 1 pattern and images © cinciut 2013 property of the author last revision 22-08-2013 starfish amigurumi crochet pattern by cinciut materials round 1 2 single_crochet in each st 10 sts 2mm hook round 2 single_crochet in first st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times 15 silvia cotton yarn 25g = 125m balls sts red yarn round 3 single_crochet in first 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times beads 20 sts transparent yarn round 4 single_crochet in first 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times fiberfill 25 sts do not finish first tip of star *chain 1 single_crochet 5 sts on body 1 chain 1 single_crochet 5 sts stitch explanation/abbreviations on body 2 12 sts chs counted as sts chain =chain round 1 single_crochet in each st and chain 12 sts slip_stitch = slip_stitch round 2 single_crochet first 4 sts decrease repeat twice 10 sts single_crochet = single_crochet rnds 3-4 single_crochet in each st around 10 sts half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet round 5 single_crochet first 3 sts decrease repeat twice 8 sts double_crochet = double_crochet rnds 6-7 single_crochet in each st around 8 sts treble_crochet = treble round 8 single_crochet first 2 sts decrease repeat twice 6 sts decrease = single_crochet decrease insert hook into the front round 9 single_crochet in each st around 6 sts loop of next two stitches yarn over draw through bind off* the 2 front loops finish with single_crochet next tip of star join on next st body 1 and repeat sc3tog = double decrease insert hook in each of passages ** joining with previous base of tip so next 3 sts making a loop every time yarn over and draw through all 4 loops finish with single_crochet that you have no hole in between repeat to = work directions in brackets the number of complete five tips times specified this means that when it is written remember to
